ARABIC: وَٱللَّهُ يُرِيدُ أَن يَتُوبَ عَلَيْكُمْ وَيُرِيدُ ٱلَّذِينَ يَتَّبِعُونَ ٱلشَّهَوَٰتِ أَن تَمِيلُوا۟ مَيْلًا عَظِيمًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Allah desires to turn towards you, but those who pursue their lower appetites desire to make you deviate completely.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: God likes to turn to you, but those who are lost in the pleasures of the flesh wish to turn you astray, far away.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And Allah indeed wants to turn graciously towards you; but those who follow their lusts would want you to drift far away from the right way.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: God wants to be merciful to you but those who follow their evil desires seek to lead you astray.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And Allah wills to incline towards you with His mercy; and those who pursue their own pleasures wish that you be far separated from the Straight Path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Allah wishes to accept your repentance, but those who follow their lusts, wish that you (believers) should deviate tremendously away (from the right path)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And Allah desires that He should turn to you (mercifully), and those who follow (their) lusts desire that you should deviate (with) a great deviation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and God desires to turn towards you, but those who follow their lusts desire you to swerve away mightily.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And Allah would turn to you in mercy; but those who follow vain desires would have you go tremendously astray.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He wishes to turn towards you in mercy, but those who follow their own passions want you to drift far away from the right path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And Allah intendeth to relent toward you, and those that follow lusts intend that ye shall incline a mighty inclining.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Allah desires to turn toward you clemently, but those who pursue their [base] appetites desire that you fall into gross waywardness.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Allah doth wish to Turn to you, but the wish of those who follow their lusts is that ye should turn away (from Him),- far, far away.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Allah wishes to accept your repentance, but those who follow their lusts, wish that you (believers) should deviate tremendously away from the Right Path.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Allah wishes to turn towards you, but those who follow their lower desires wish you to greatly swerve away.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: God intends to redeem you, but those who follow their desires want you to turn away utterly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Allah wants to accept your repentance, but those who follow [their] passions want you to digress [into] a great deviation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [4:27] And God desires to turn [forgivingly] towards you (He repeats this in order to expand upon it), but those who follow their passions, the Jews and Christians, or the Magians and adulterers, desire that you deviate with a terrible deviation, transgressing what is right by committing what has been forbidden you, so that you might be like them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And Allah wishes to turn to you in mercy) He wishes to overlook your transgression when He made adultery and marrying your sisters, from the father's side, forbidden for you; (but those who follow vain desires) i.e. adultery and marrying their sisters from their fathers' side, namely, the Jews (would have you go tremendously astray) commit a serious error by marrying your sisters, from the father's side, by claiming that it is lawful in their Scripture.
